content: Current wheat prices in Delhi mandi: Rs. 2100-2200 per quintal. Demand is high due to festival season. Transport cost to nearby districts is Rs. 50-80 per quintal.
Rice prices in Mumbai APMC: Rs. 3500-3800 per quintal for basmati variety. Quality premium for aged rice. Storage facilities available at mandi.
Tomato prices in Bangalore market: Rs. 15-20 per kg. Supply is good from local farms. Prices expected to remain stable for next 2 weeks.
